name: Micro Spy
description:
First: This game is part of Jam2020 hosted by javidx9 · #olcCodeJam2020 at https://itch.io/jam/olc-codejam-2020.

Second: it is an experiment more than a enjoyable game.

Third: warning, it is under construction, levels can be broken.

Description: you are a micro spy and must scape from micro Daleks to save the  world.

Making of: 

It was made using olcPixelGameEngine from  javidx9.

I spent 10 hours learning olcPixelGameEngine, remembering my C++ old times and making the game.
